page.title: 11"REDEHAM HALL FARM"
page.content:
{ Redeham Hall Farm}is bigger than most farms in this area, it is{500}acres.It was once{two small farms}now put together.It is mostly a{livestock farm but they do grow{maize}mainly for the animals like cattle.They have{200 {milking cows,500 cows}altogether.Their cattle are mostly{Friesian}cattle but there are some{Charoldais}cattle on the farm.They have{sheep}and a lot of {calves},which are fattened for{ export.They have just bought a{machine which{harvests}all the{maize.}The farm is run by{5}workers. They have some{J.C.B's}for digging ditches to drain the fields.
{ {
